sentences.english: The major technique norms have over taken those of importations.

sentences.english: And earlier this month, the government executed its top food-and-drug regulator after convicting him on bribery charges.
sentences.chinese: 本月初，政府因受贿罪处决了原国家药检局的局长。

sentences.english: These are they who have not been defiled with women, for they are virgins.

sentences.english: How much procyanidins would you have to consume to feel the benefits?

sentences.english: Love is a kind of very elegant thing to can improve the value of life.

sentences.english: He was scheduled to begin a series of 1550 comeback concerts in London.

sentences.english: Emancipation Park was originally a rich garden reverted to the government after the liberation.
